# Tutorials

Step-by-step tutorials to help you master PTools. These hands-on guides walk you through common workflows and advanced techniques.

```{toctree} :maxdepth: 2 :caption: Tutorial Topics:

getting-started ai-workflows data-processing-pipelines file-management development-workflows advanced-techniques ```

## Tutorial Overview

These tutorials are designed to be followed in sequence, building your knowledge progressively:

  1. Getting Started - Basic setup and first commands

  2. AI Workflows - Working with language models and chat interfaces

  3. Data Processing Pipelines - Transform and analyze data with flow

  4. File Management - Advanced file operations and monitoring

  5. Development Workflows - Integrate PTools into your development process

  6. Advanced Techniques - Power user tips and complex integrations

## Prerequisites

  • PTools installed and working (see [Installation Guide](../installation.rst))

  • Basic command-line familiarity

  • Python knowledge helpful but not required for basic usage

## Tutorial Conventions

Throughout these tutorials: - $ indicates commands to run in your terminal - Code blocks show expected output - Tip boxes highlight important concepts - Warning boxes point out common pitfalls

## Learning Path

### Beginners Start with: 1. Getting Started 2. Basic AI Workflows 3. Simple File Management

### Intermediate Users Focus on: 1. Data Processing Pipelines 2. Development Workflows 3. Advanced File Operations

### Advanced Users Explore: 1. Advanced Techniques 2. Custom Integrations 3. Performance Optimization

## Example Data

Some tutorials use example data files. You can download these from the tutorial repository or create your own following the patterns shown.

## Getting Help

If you get stuck: 1. Use ptools <command> â€“help for command-specific help 2. Check the [User Guide](../user-guide/index.rst) for detailed explanations 3. Review the [CLI Reference](../cli-reference/index.rst) for complete command options
